fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives: Justice and home affairs, digital Single market and other single market initiatives; free movement of services, etc
goals__remit: Provide EU representation services to clients, primarily in legal field. Monitoring and lobbying services, including organising and attending meetings with EU officials and attending conferences, hearings, workshops etc organised by, or involving, the EU institutions.  Also liaison and cooperation with other stakeholders.
relevant_communication: EU developments newsletter generated for primary client
customers: General Council of the Bar of England & Wales
